title: AMBIENT DREAMS VOLUME 1
description: 5 full Ambient and Emotionally driven atmospheric songs, perfect for setting a mood or tone within a room, scene or menu. All tracks seamlessly loop and you will also get access to the individual parts so that you can mix and match as needed.
longDescription:
Audio Preview Mix: https://youtu.be/g0hezw6AW_Y


5 full Ambient and Emotionally driven atmospheric songs, perfect for setting a mood or tone within a room, scene or menu. All tracks seamlessly loop and you will also get access to the individual parts of each track so that you can mix and match as needed. This pack is a perfect combination of relaxing, atmospheric and uplifting film, game and animation style music.


Contents:

AD1_Ethereal_75bpm - 3:25

AD1_Hopeful_100bpm - 2:05

AD1_ DrivingEmotion_128bpm - 2:00

AD1_ BigChill_60.70bpm - 2:07

AD1_Choir&Drums_70bpm - 3:39

Each individual song part is included in the project as well.
technicalDetails:
Number of Audio tracks: 29
Number of Audio Cues: 29
Sample rate \ bit rate: 44.1 kHz, 16bit Stereo WAVs
Does music\audio loop: Yes
How many minutes of audio provided: 01:17:13 (including separate parts)
Platforms Tested: OSX
Documentation Included: No
Intended Platform - All
